 the sound volume.

 distance in which the sound intensity is dropped by half.

float maxdist
 distance in which the sound intensity is dropped to 0.

flySound* snd
 a flySound pointer of the wave file in memory.

Detailed Description

Sound class.

This class implements a sound that can be attached to a scene object or event.
